com.magnet.spi

Interface InvocationContext<T>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    InterceptorInvocationContext<T>

    public interface InvocationContext<T>
    Provides the necessary machinery to handle interception, decoration, validation and listening.
    See Also:
    ServiceInterceptor, ServiceDecorator, ServiceValidator, ServiceListener, ServiceProvider

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Context getContext()
      The context data associated with the call, or null if context is unavailable.
      Method getMethod()
      Returns the method of the target class for which the interceptor was invoked.
      Object[] getParameters()
      Returns the parameter values that will be passed to the method of the target class.
      Class<T> getTarget()
      Returns the Api instance that was originally intended / invoked.
      Object getTargetInstance()
      The target instance of this invocation context.

    • Method Detail

      • getContext

        Context getContext()
        The context data associated with the call, or null if context is unavailable.

      • getTarget

        Class<T> getTarget()
        Returns the Api instance that was originally intended / invoked.

      • getTargetInstance

        Object getTargetInstance()
        The target instance of this invocation context. This is usually the ServiceConnector instance given this invocation context. Returns null if the invocation context cannot be determined.

        The target instance should not be called by the interceptor chain - only introspection should be used!

      • getMethod

        Method getMethod()
        Returns the method of the target class for which the interceptor was invoked.

      • getParameters

        Object[] getParameters()
        Returns the parameter values that will be passed to the method of the target class.
